name: Rhythm Alley
description:
A game I made as the final fight for a discord I'm in. I used all the participants, making this a larger thing than I expected. Apologies if any timing is off, I had to manually add the timing.

Controls:

Click on a button to choose the level.

Press left mouse button or space to "attack"

Escape will bring you back to the menu.

All music is under premium license by Dark Fantasy Studio

All tracks come from the album Archives Vol 3 The Joke

Main Characters:

The Hidden (the mage) by https://twitter.com/304wv66

Interrobang (the guy with the bag) by Me

Raggae Cameos:

Unnamed (the rectangle) by Will

Bofoi (the orange hair one) by Flamedoxia

Cowboy Cameos:

Dhad by https://lahgolagorian.itch.io/

Juji Sakana by Malec

Move Your Feet Cameos:

Bruni (left person waving) by journeythepanda

Viathan by https://twitter.com/WynterComixx

reiko (the one in a beanie) by https://twitter.com/Slothakiin

Natalie (the one talking to her) by Michael C
